prompts: Create a playful electric-type Pokemon with bright yellow fur and pointy ears.
Imagine a small, energetic Pokemon that can generate powerful electric shocks.
Show me a cute Pokemon that loves to explore forests and urban areas.
Design a Pokemon that has a round body and long, lightning bolt-shaped tail.
Make a character that embodies the traits of friendship and loyalty in its design.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with chubby cheeks and a happy, upbeat personality.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in both grassy fields and city parks.
